means: 证明( prove的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: That contract proved to be a millstone around his neck.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个合同结果成了他的一个负担。

sentence.Network_en: The city proved to be something of a disappointment.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果这座城市有点儿令人失望。

sentence.Network_en: Once he knew his father's name, finding his whereabouts proved surprisingly easy.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦他知道了父亲的名字，查找他父亲的下落就变得出奇地容易。

PerfectNetExp.abs: she proved adequate to the job ., 事实证明她能胜任此项工作.

石油词汇英语翻译(P) ... proved reserves 探明的储量 proved 证实的 proven recoverable gas reserves 探明的天然气可采储量.
They proved up the copper deposit ., 他们探明了铜矿的矿床.

territory中文 ... territory planning 国土规划 proved reserves 证实储量 proven territory 勘探证实地区.
proving temperature 检定温度proving time 检验时间proving 检验

entry.def: If something proves to be true or to have a particular quality, it becomes clear after a period of time that it is true or has that quality.

example.ex: We have been accused of exaggerating before, but unfortunately all our reports proved to be true...
example.tran: 以前一直有人指责我们夸大事实，但遗憾的是，我们所有的报道都证明是真实的。

example.ex: In the past this process of transition has often proven difficult.
example.tran: 过去这一过渡过程常常很艰难。

entry.def: If you prove that something is true, you show by means of argument or evidence that it is definitely true.

example.ex: You brought this charge. You prove it!...
example.tran: 你提出了这项控告。你拿出证据来！

example.ex: The results prove that regulation of the salmon farming industry is inadequate.
example.tran: 结果证明对鲑鱼饲养行业的管理不够完善。

entry.def: If you prove yourself to have a certain good quality, you show by your actions that you have it.

example.ex: Margaret proved herself to be a good mother...
example.tran: 玛格丽特证明了自己是个好妈妈。

example.ex: As a composer he proved himself adept at large dramatic forms...
example.tran: 身为作曲家的他证明了自己在创作大型戏剧方面驾轻就熟。

entry.tran: 证明自己的能力（或知识）
entry.def: If you prove a point, you show other people that you know something or can do something, although your action may have no other purpose.

example.ex: They made a 3,000 mile detour simply to prove a point.
example.tran: 他们绕行3,000英里只是为了证明自己能够做到。

auth_sentence.content: Vernon Davis's two spectacular touchdowns ultimately proved insufficient.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vernon Davis's two spectacular touchdowns ultimately proved insufficient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vernon Davis's two spectacular touchdowns ultimately proved insufficient.

auth_sentence.content: The Brotherhood proved to be a successful political group.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Brotherhood proved to be a successful political group.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Brotherhood proved to be a successful political group.

auth_sentence.content: It have been proved that no aether in space.
auth_sentence.res_content: It have been proved that no aether in space.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It have been proved that no aether in space.

Sentence.sentence: He has proved to be a better reader than the woman.
The change cut their expenditures in half, but the new living arrangement proved too challenging.
